title: Royal Hawaiian Pikake Body Lotion - 8.0 fl. oz.
features: Spreads smoothly and absorbs quickly into skin without leaving a greasy or heavy feel
Perfect souvenir or gift to bring home for family and friends from Hawaii!
description: Smooth this pikake-scented nourishing body lotion, infused with hydrating macadamia and kukui nut oils, onto your skin, and let the natural emollients soften your skin as the enchanting scent of the tropics dissolve your cares away. This body lotion is made in Hawaii. It also contains healing Aloe Vera Leaf juice, Safflower Seed oil, Coconut Oil, and beneficial extracts from healing sources such as the Papaya, White Ginger root, Hibiscus, Pacific Sea Kelp. Additionally, it includes vitamins A & E. This Hawaiian product is the perfect reminder of your island vacation or give it as a gift of Aloha! It complements the Royal Hawaiian Pikake perfume and cologne, both of which we also sell.

title: Island Bath and Body Pikake Jasmine Body Lotion
